definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

sentences.english: Steel making in the open-hearth furnace is a very slow process, much slower than the Bessemer one.
sentences.chinese: 平炉炼钢是一个很慢的过程，比转炉炼钢慢得多。

sentences.english: The abrasive grit we get is prime material for electric steelmaking and converter.
sentences.chinese: 这种铁粒可作为转炉和电炉炼钢的优质原料。

sentences.english: TSO, TSC is a compound probe best-suited to dynamic control.
sentences.chinese: TSC副枪是用于氧气转炉动态控制用的复合探头。

sentences.english: The converter sludges come out of the dedusting system during the production of steel making.
sentences.chinese: 转炉烟尘是炼钢生产过程中排出的含铁粉尘。

sentences.english: The practice of production with reduced hot metal consumption of the converter concast route at Handan Iron & Steel Group Co. is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了邯钢降低转炉连铸钢铁料消耗的生产实践。

sentences.english: The problems in the scrubbing water treatment system of converter flue gas of Xiangtan Iron & Steel Co. Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了湘钢转炉烟气除尘水处理系统存在的问题。

sentences.english: The framework of converter puncher is analyzed by fatigue analyzing.
sentences.chinese: 对转炉捅风眼机机架进行疲劳分析。

sentences.english: Melting behavior of silica flux in the converting process of high grade copper matte was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了高品位铜冰铜转炉吹炼石英熔剂熔化行为。

sentences.english: The experiences to use converter gas in heating furnace of the rod rolling mill in Tangshan Iron and Steel Company are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了唐钢棒材轧钢加热炉烧转炉煤气的经验。

sentences.english: The key technologies for production of special steel in a converter are also described.
sentences.chinese: 对转炉特殊钢生产工艺的技术关键进行了论述。

sentences.english: The technical features of 100t converter and wide and heavy continuous casting slab system were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍柳钢100吨转炉及宽厚板坯连铸系统技术特点。

sentences.english: The practical production show that the converter gas can be used in reheating furnace of steel rolling.
sentences.chinese: 实践证明，轧钢加热炉使用转炉煤气是可行的。

sentences.english: Slag splashing is effective in extending the lining life.
sentences.chinese: 溅渣护炉技术是提高转炉炉龄的有效措施。

sentences.english: Necessity of slag detection during tapping steel for basic oxygen converter is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 主要叙述转炉出钢检测夹渣的必要性。

sentences.english: The time of blowing oxygen can be shorten efficaciously by increasing supplying oxygen intensity in converter.
sentences.chinese: 提高转炉供氧强度可以有效地缩短每炉钢的吹氧时间。

sentences.english: The BOF process can realize a commercial production of a series of shot steel.
sentences.chinese: 转炉工艺流程能够实现炮弹系列用钢的工业化生产。

definition: a blast furnace (in modern times)/a draft assisted furnace for smelting metals
to sinter/to agglomerate ore by burning
